version_description: This release expands support for international users with the addition of an edition for India and mobile alerts for readers of our Japanese edition.
This release expands support for international users with the addition of an edition for India and mobile alerts for readers of our Japanese edition.

This update aligns our story selection on mobile with that of our flagship website, Reuters.com, providing an expertly curated selection of the day’s most important stories, and rolls out The Wire, a dynamic feed of fast-moving headlines from around the world.

- Improved article pages with multimedia content and links to related and suggested stories.
- Easier access to market data.
- Extended data coverage on stocks, bonds, commodities and currencies.
- Improved quote pages.
- Support for landscape orientation.

• Completely redesigned from the ground up to better fit your busy life.
• Build your own news timeline with additional personalization features.
• Editorial Highlights: Get up to speed quickly when you've got a moment to spare.
• Richer Reuters TV integration, including more program length options.
• Follow your money with the enhanced personalized stock watchlist.
• Improved Search functionality that works across articles, videos and more.

• Completely redesigned from the ground up to better fit your busy life.

More content, less scrolling.

In this version, we give you extra control in personalizing the density of content within the app. We have added new a Settings control called "Feed Style" in the profile section. Just choose to see fewer images or even or no images at all. It's up to you.

Your feedback is much appreciated and put into consideration as we continue to improve the Reuters News app. Please keep it coming. We can be reached at reutersmobile.support@thomsonreuters.com.

More content, less scrolling.

In this version, we give you extra control in personalizing the density of content within the app. We have added new a Settings control called "Feed Style" in the profile section. Just choose to see fewer images or even or no images at all. It's up to you.

Your feedback is much appreciated and put into consideration as we continue to improve the Reuters News app. Please keep it coming. We can be reached at reutersmobile.support@thomsonreuters.com.

Our new version brings several improvements, as requested by loyal readers like you:

• iPad readers, we heard you! The Reuters News app has been redesigned for larger screens, with less whitespace and more layout options you can customize yourself.
• For those of you who missed The Wire, we promise it's still there! Simply add it to your app by searching for ""The Wire"" and tapping the + button.
• For Markets users, we have updated stocks, quotes, the Watchlist and more to perform faster while also refreshing data more smoothly.
• We have also addressed several minor performance issues in this version.

Please continue to provide feedback via reutersmobile.support@thomsonreuters.com or reviews.

Our new version brings several improvements, as requested by loyal readers like you:

• iPad readers, we heard you! The Reuters News app has been redesigned for larger screens, with less whitespace and more layout options you can customize yourself.
• For those of you who missed The Wire, we promise it's still there! Simply add it to your app by searching for ""The Wire"" and tapping the + button.
• For Markets users, we have updated stocks, quotes, the Watchlist and more to perform faster while also refreshing data more smoothly.
• We have also addressed several minor performance issues in this version.

Please continue to provide feedback via reutersmobile.support@thomsonreuters.com or reviews.
